extendedInfo.description: Asia's leading news and information mall, AsiaOne - a Singapore Press Holdings (SPH) portal - features the latest current affair updates and lifestyle news from Singapore and the region. Information can be readily accessed while youâre on-the-go. It also provides you with two ways to read the latest headlines - a traditional listing view or a visual slideshow view. News: - Read the latest Singapore, Malaysia, Asia and world, crime, business, showbiz and sports news, and share the stories by email, Twitter or Facebook - Read lifestyle news from AsiaOne's no. 1 Health site in Singapore - Are you a motoring fan? We've dedicated a Motoring section in the app for all you fans to catch up on the latest updates Rate our stories: Our rating mechanism in our news articles allows you to "Love" or "Hate" the story. About AsiaOne AsiaOne is a free-access, one-stop information mall which serves usersâ news, business and lifestyle needs. Within the all-encompassing portal are unique communities where users congregate online for their various interests. Besides accessing news and infotainment from Singapore Press Holdingsâ (SPH) suite of newspapers, AsiaOne users can engage in special interest sites which cover finance, motoring, technology, health and various lifestyle topics. Every month, the AsiaOne homepage and its various lifestyle sites enjoy 30 million pageviews from over 2 million unique visitors. The site attracts PMEB/Ts (Professional, Managers, Executives & Businesmen/Technicians) Online advertising and interactive marketing opportunities at AsiaOne include: banner advertising, mobile advertising, electronic direct mailer, viral marketing gateway, sponsorship and these can be integrated with SPHâs other media platforms. AsiaOne connects marketers to a desirable demographic that represents the cream of online audiences.

reviews.title: Poor.
reviews.comment: I downloaded this news app, AsiaOne on my Samsung Galaxy S3 but to my horror, it crash or \'force close\' on my Samsung Galaxy S3 due to advertising :(    Sorry, developer. I have to give a 1 star rating until the news app is fix, then I can give a perfect 5 star.
reviews.author: Muhammad Faezin Bin Mohamed Yasin

reviews.title: Crashed & Advertisemem Keep popping up
reviews.comment: Used to be my favourite apps to read news but now it seems to crashed and the advertisement of the fastest mind Keep popping up  despite skipping it for more than 6times. I thought it was finally close with the advertisement but after reading one news, the advertisement pop up again and constant pressing on the Skip is required.   Please fixed this error otherwise it makes No sense in keeping this  app
reviews.author: Christabelle Ho

reviews.title: Crashes all the time.  Unusable.
reviews.comment: Can\'t read it because it crashes.  Frustrating!
reviews.author: Matthew Tan

reviews.title: Crashes everytime
reviews.comment: Bad apps. Crashes everything I open it. Crash again when I try to share news on Facebook
reviews.author: Wendy Bai

reviews.title: Looping advertisements
reviews.comment: There\'s no way to get to the news bcos of the looping ad (from man of tai chi to despicable 2 to systema to wda and all ovet again) and then it crashed.. Will rate ZERO star if possible
reviews.author: A Chan

reviews.title: 0 rate
reviews.comment: Frequently hung after advertising.   After reboot, it s fine. But after a while come back to this, and same hung thing.   IPhone is fine. But not this even when I use device with 2GB ram and Snapdragon 600.
reviews.author: Philip Choy

reviews.comment: Easy news short and sharp
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps crashing. Advert spamming
reviews.comment: Advertisements keep popping up. So irritating. Keeps crashing. Worst app ever
reviews.author: Jeff Ho

reviews.title: App needs more work
reviews.comment: Asia One is a great source of news. Good that stuff is seperated into the different tabs / categories. BUT - this app really needs fixing. It crashes, force-closes very often and loading is really slow. Please fix this. And why does AsiaOne need my location info + GPS ?  Please remove.
reviews.author: Kervin Chua

reviews.title: Losy
reviews.comment: App crashes everyone when trying to rearrange the news category.  Many feedbacks written to developer but non action taken.  Uses excessive data.
reviews.author: Stanley Lim

reviews.comment: Good news app
reviews.author: Lasith Sameera

reviews.title: lousy app
reviews.comment: keep crash

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Very timely news and articles from the region, not just from the wires. I like the picture galleries and extra services like 4D, TOTO, etc. HUAT AH!

reviews.title: Keep on crushing
reviews.comment: Keep on crushing when loading. Once It even cause My Hp to reboot.

reviews.title: Doesnt load pages
reviews.comment: Serious technical flaws a major disappointment.  Pls fix asap.

reviews.comment: Adverstisement error?!

reviews.title: Ads
reviews.comment: Why I cant skip ads? It kept on looping on the ads after 5 seconds and another ad came up..

reviews.comment: Im ok w the ads but it crashes every time I open it on android phones.

reviews.comment: How i wish the App is opening (crash) as well as the advertisement...Am using Galaxy Note.

reviews.title: Fix it!!
reviews.comment: What is wrong with this app. I have been trying to read the news but it keeps crashing. How is this situation of any help or service to people to subscribe to it??? Fix this problem!!
